name: Jordan Mitchell
persona: Jordan Mitchell is a 20-year-old Business Administration major who is currently struggling academically, with a CGPA of 1.24. Jordan finds it challenging to stay organized and motivated, often lacking the self-discipline needed to keep up with coursework. Despite experiencing some test anxiety, Jordan’s main obstacles are low academic self-efficacy and perseverance. Jordan is aware of the need for improvement and hopes to find strategies to boost motivation and develop better study habits in the future.
